short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlocksPay is a wallet that gives you easy access to all things in crypto and Web3. Switch accounts and chains with 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BlocksPay, the game-changing wallet for XDC and all EVM chains. It's browser extension wallet designed for multi-chain scenarios. It can automatically switch to the corresponding blockchain based on the DeFi website you are visiting. BlocksPay also provides user-friendly transaction details for NFT. It is built and maintained by the BlocksScan team.
